title: brives887
author: brives887
content: Reef's board-based layer 1 blockchain with smart contract capabilities provides an intuitive user experience, high scalability, low rates, and helps the ecosystem become a goto platform for NFT projects. Reef is the most advanced EVM compatible blockchain with smart contract capabilities. Based on the nominated Proof of Stake (NPoS) consensus mechanism, the network offers low rates and scalability in addition to various features such as native token bridge, on-chain governance, and recurring payments. Trade REEF with mexc.com. Finally, the platform also supports additional virtual machines that allow developers to write code in several different programming languages.
